scripts.say: Ta-da~~~~ Here is the debut of Ping Hai's Mid-Autumn Festival attire!
I'm so s-shy...Yat Sen's gift...
Wow! So beautiful---
Say….is this also a “custom” for the Mid-Autumn Festival?
No it's not, but because Ping Hai and Ning Hai have been so hard working, I wanted to give them both a little reward~
Was... was this hand-stitched?! My my Helena... we’re no match for them!
...I can't seem to be able to hear the criticisms.
In any case, let's start the meal! I want to drink that osmanthus wine!
Of course! O what a lovely full moon tonight. Let's finish all this osmanthus wine everyone, hehehe--- Oh! But be sure to leave some for the Moon Goddess
So is this...is this Sara's mooncakes?......
...big Sisterrrr…
Hmmm, ~nibbles~...Sara you still have room to improve...
One look and you can tell that it's not edible... yet you swallowed it… such close sibling affection!
Lady Lex's mooncakes looks delicious, ~nibbles~ but still the taste is not the same as lady Yat Sen's.
Your mooncakes not only turned out to be pizza-shaped, but they even tasted like pizza? I'm not sure if I can call this a clever trick or----
Cleveland, did you really get Yat Sen to teach you her methods? The more I look at yours, the more I think it resembles a burrito.
Haha! I mixed all those ingredients together disproportionately! Is there a problem? It's all going to end up in your stomach anyway!
It-it's definitely not the same! If it wasn't ~coughs~, ~coughs~.
Tsk tsk, talking with a mouthful, would you care for some osmanthus wine?
Looks like the only person who actually made “mooncakes” was me. Ning Hai, Helena... Ping Hai, wait, how did your mooncakes turn out to be steamed buns instead?!
Hehehe~ Sara borrowed the mooncake molds from me… I like to eat steamed buns so it doesn't matter, I can eat all of these by myself!
Heyy...don't hide these like it's buried treasure… I haven't tried mooncake flavored buns before! Nibbles~
Ping Hai, let's share these.
Sister...
Sister… don’t choke on your food, here, drink some osmanthus wine~
Mmmm, so fragrant….
Tastes so so good! Give me ten barrels, then the cavalry of the ocean will be yours to command!
First do this, then add this….and then….
Oh, I'll have to write this all down! If I have trouble making this, can I still ask you for advice?
Of course~
Sis, can I drink some, too?
Just a little bit~
Moon Goddess, here's a toast to everyone who, whether being here or not, I wish that everyone can be united with their loved ones.
